alahazra.name: Alahazra
alahazra.description: At a young age, Alahazra was struck blind and began exhibiting supernatural powers. Accused of being a follower of the gods, she was driven from her atheist home in Rahadoum into the desert. Although the experience almost killed her, she emerged with the realization that her abilities came not from any deity, but from the powers of the sun and ﬂames. Now Alahazra travels the world, exposing any injustice she encounters with her scouring light.

grazzle.name: Grazzle
grazzle.description: The scalykind prowls the cataract of Oxjaw Falls, lying in wait for travelers benightedly crossing Osirion in small bands. Here, one voice decides if the omens are right for seizing upon prey. Grazzle, prophet of the reptile gods, notes the landing of a kingfsher as a propitious omen, then hacks it apart and bleaches its bones for further enlightenment. His warriors guard the altar to his cold-blooded pantheon when he embarks on visionquest, certain he will return with portents of violence and glory.

ramexes.name: Ramexes
ramexes.description: In Kaer Maga, the City on the Cliff, the line between monsters and people is crudely drawn. Deep in Downmarket, those hunting answers they’d hide from their closest friends will routinely fnd themselves at the booth of Ramexes. This devil-touched seer claims, not without merit, to be able to see the worst things that will befall his customers. That has not slowed their tide. One man’s peril is another’s fortune, and Ramexes will happily take the coins of both.
